Deathtouch
[i]Wrath[/i] – Whenever a creature you control with a [i]Crit[/i] ability attacks, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
[i]Loptrian Girl[/i] – Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, target opponent loses that much life.
[i]Kia[/i] – If an effect an opponent controls would tap one or more permanents you control, untap that permanent instead. Creatures you control can't have stun counters put on them.
